name: Business Creation Center Salzburg
overview:
For a period of one and a half years we have provided a launch platform with facilities and infrastructure, professional counseling and coaching, expert support, training programs, seminars, monetary and financial support to the successful establishment of the company.

By academic institutions and the University of Salzburg University of Salzburg and the other partner is a comprehensive research infrastructure. Experienced business experts and mentors to assess the start-up projects and give valuable feedback on your projects.

In the case of positive decision is made between the Business Creation Center Salzburg GmbH and the applicant is a contract for the duration of the stay closed in establishing the center.

After inclusion in the Business Creation Center Salzburg include you will receive comprehensive support, infrastructure, coaching and financial support.
